home.title: Michele Scarpa
home.heading: Hi, I'm Michele Scarpa!
home.description:
I'm a frontend engineer with a strong background in full-stack development, specialized in crafting responsive, high-performance web applications. My expertise spans modern JavaScript and TypeScript frameworks such as Angular and React, with a growing interest in Svelte for its innovative approach to UI reactivity and performance.


I thrive on building user interfaces that are not only functional but also elegant and maintainable. My work often bridges frontend and backend concerns, and I've contributed to projects ranging from digital signage platforms for Smart TVs (Tizen OS) to geospatial web applications and mobile apps for Android.


Beyond code, I enjoy sharing knowledge through technical talks, tutorials, and developer content, often focusing on frontend architecture, performance optimization, and developer experience. I'm always eager to explore new technologies and contribute to building better digital experiences.
